ability.name: Synaptic Anchor
ability.flavor: You disrupt an enemy's strike and create a feedback loop in their mind, preventing them from focusing on future attacks.
ability.trigger: The target takes damage from another creature's ability while in the area of your Null Field ability.

metadata.flavor: You disrupt an enemy's strike and create a feedback loop in their mind, preventing them from focusing on future attacks.

effects.effect: The target takes half the damage, and if the triggering crea ture has I < AVERAGE, they are dazed (save ends). While the triggering creature is dazed this way, they take psychic damage equal to your Intuition score whenever they use a main action.
